at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.json

Class JSONDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.json.JSONDecoder

  • public class JSONDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class features methods for decoding and encoding JSON-Strings, which are tailored for use in the AndroidPiControl-project.
    The json.simple package has been used for decoding and encoding the JSON-Strings.
    For detailed information on this package visit the referenced link.
    Author:
    Zyklone
    See Also:
    Project json.simple

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger
      The logger that is used for logging messages.
      private static org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser parser
      The parser that is required to parse the Strings to JSON-Objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      private JSONDecoder()
      The Constructor has no use (since this class is not supposed to be instantiated) and is therefore declared private.

    • Method Detail

      • createParser

        public static void createParser()
        Deprecated. Creates a JSONParser.
        Run this method at the start of your program.

      • extractValidJSON

        private static java.lang.String extractValidJSON(java.lang.String originalMessage)
        Tries to extract a valid JSON-String out of originalMessage and returns the extracted message, otherwise an empty String is returned
        Parameters:
        originalMessage - the String that supposedly contains a JSON-String
        Returns:
        the extracted message, otherwise an empty String

      • decode

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> decode(java.lang.String message)
        This method searches for the values of their associated variables in a JSON-String.
        It returns an Array of the values in the same order that the variables were given in.
        Parameters:
        message - contains the JSON-String to be decoded and searched
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing the values of their respective keys.

      • decode

        public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String message,
                                      java.lang.String keyword)
        This method searches for the value of the given keyword in a JSON-String.
        Parameters:
        message - contains the JSON-String to be decoded and searched
        keyword - contains the variables whose values are to be found
        Returns:
        a String containing the value for the given keyword

      • encodeFromMap

        public static java.lang.String encodeFromMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> messageMap)
